filterForm.chooseFilters: Select check-in, check-out dates and number of guests

first.title: Repairs and Cleaning
first.description: Cleaning and inspections of properties are conducted before and after occupancy, as well as repairs when necessary.

second.title: Furnishing
second.description: We help choose key details for maximum results with minimal investments.

third.title: Photography
third.description: We organize a professional photo session for each object.

fourth.title: Online Promotion
fourth.description: Promotion of properties on international platforms through SEO, social media, and local portals.

fifth.title: Housing Safety
fifth.description: All tenants are registered with DTCM. We take a deposit and check passports before check-in and out.

first.title: Registration
first.description: According to the law, every rental property must be registered in the state system. We will help you with this.

second.title: Preparation
second.description: Professional photo shoot of the property and comprehensive cleaning so you can offer guests the perfect stay.

third.title: Advertising
third.description: Your property will be listed on 15 popular platforms, including Booking.com and Airbnb. Properly crafted listings to attract customers.

fourth.title: Briefing
fourth.description: We provide instructions and the contract immediately after booking and also assist with inquiries and emergencies through our support service.

fifth.title: Dividends
fifth.description: We pay owners the full rental amount monthly, deducting only our commission, with no delays.
